page.title: 07A School Day,Darras Hall
page.content:
"A typical day for me is to get up at 7.45. Mum opens my curtains.While I'm in the shower I wash really quickly because I race my brother.
Downstairs I have some Weetabix and milk.I can hear Mum saying "Have you made your bed yet?"...automatically I say "YES". After breakfast I get my things ready and we drive to school.
We spend the morning doing Maths,English,and Singing.I don't like singing at all. I might have a go on the computer.Then the bell goes,I have a packed lunch.We have environmental studies after lunch and quiet reading which is my best lesson,then football. After football it's always a rush to get dressed. I'm usually the last one out of school." Max, age 9
